directions: Combine the chicken, mayonnaise, feta cheese, green onions, sour cream, and chipotle peppers in a bowl. Season with garlic salt and pepper to taste; stir until evenly combined.
ingredients: ¼ cup crumbled reduced-fat feta cheese
3  chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, minced
garlic salt and pepper to taste
title: Chipotle Chicken Salad
